name: Cup Cake Maker Pro
description:
You have anything delicious? Come on, how could you miss our Cupcake Maker?

Apparently people love eating delicate food, but definitely making something yummy is more enjoyable. Now we offer you the easiest way to create your own cupcake of whatever flavor you like, and decorate it in any way as you wish.

Here we have everything you may need. With them, you can make a simple one within 1 minute, or if you want, hours can be devoted to make it awesome and gorgeous.

Oh, almost forget, let's take a picture, then it's your call to either keep it in camera roll, or share it with family and friends to let others admire your works.

It's the only place to show your unlimited creativity! We'll meet you in the game, shall we?

How to play:
Choose your favorite flavor first, and drag all the ingredients into the mixing bowl. Then pick 4 colored cups you like into the mould and fill them. After that, you need to put them in oven, where you also need to control the time not to burn them.
All right, it's time to decorate! Plenty of items, such as cream tops, sprinkles and candies are all prepared for you! As everything is done, you really need to reward yourself for your excellent and hard work!
Of course, you can also submit your wonderful work to attend our Best Cookings Contest. Just tap the camera icon then click the "Contest" button under the picture.
No time to waste, we'll leave you to enjoy the amazing game!

Features:
- Hundreds of choices, pick anything you like to bake!
- Easy to play, baking has never been so much fun!
- Hard to forget, you can easily save the picture or share it with your family and friends via E-mails!
- A weekly award is hold for you to show others the tasty cupcake you just made!

# Ads: -
Please note this game is Free. In this Game No one Place Shown Ads Or No one In-app. so as to not to disturb you during Any path and You Can Enjoy with Game.
